snippet: The company, which is working on a series of projects to improve service, said it had added more phone and broadband subscribers.
abstract: Cablevision Systems reports a second-quarter profit that exceeds analysts' estimates as it adds more phone and broadband subscribers; company says its net income fell to $63.5 million, or 24 cents a share, from $87.8 million, or 32 cents a share, a year earlier.
lead_paragraph: The company, which is working on a series of projects to improve service, said it had added more phone and broadband subscribers.

headline.main: Cablevision Beats Forecasts in Wake of its AMC Spinoff
headline.print_headline: Cablevision Beats Forecasts In Wake of Its AMC Spinoff
